short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a 'Covers'-area to the Steam games page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Burn your Steam game backups to a CD that's as great as the game itself. For that you need really good covers. This add-on adds a Covers-area to the Steam games page.

It include:
- Disc faces
- Jewel cases
- Amary cases
- BlueRay casee
